name: Only One Way Out
description:
This game was originally developed for a self imposed 3 hour gamejam. The theme  I had was 'A single match'. I wanted to learn to use 2D lighting in Unity2D and create a basic AI. Unfortunately i never ended up making the basic AI, but I did make an interesting if not stressful expirience. 

Plans for the future? 
Ehhhh. Not sure. I feel like it's a good enough portfolio piece. I might make a sequel one day which has an actual full gameplay loop and has all the bugs fixed.. but.. maybe later.
